member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Assessment.SqlAssessmentExtensions
member.summary: Provides a set of ( in Visual Basic) methods for checking SMO objects for best practice compliance.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Assessment.SqlAssessmentExtensions.Engine
member.summary: An assessment engine used by all extension methods. Use Configuration property of this object to customize configuration.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Assessment.SqlAssessmentExtensions.GetAssessmentItems(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.SqlSmoObject,System.String[])
member.summary: Finds all available checks for given .
member.param: Returned checks are applicable to this target .
Optional array of check ids or tags to select only specific checks.
member.returns: Returns an for target .

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Assessment.SqlAssessmentExtensions.GetAssessmentResultsList(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.SqlSmoObject,System.String[])
member.summary: Asynchronously runs assessment for given and gives a describing discovered issues.
member.param: Target .
Optional array of check ids or tags to perform only selected checks.
member.returns: Returns an for target . Returns an empty if no issues detected.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Assessment.SqlAssessmentExtensions.GetAssessmentResultsList(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.SqlSmoObject,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Assessment.Checks.ICheck})
member.summary: Asynchronously runs assessment for given and gives a describing discovered issues. This method performs only given checks from .
member.param: Target .
Optional to perform only selected checks.
member.returns: Returns an for target . Returns an empty if no issues detected.
